AlmostBinary_Binarify.commandLineArgs: --to-binary Print ( \" "input: " \" ) str = InputString ( ) if ( str == \" "hello" \" ) { PrintLine ( \" "if statement" \" ) } elseif ( str == \" "world" \" ) { PrintLine ( \" "elseif statement" \" ) } else { PrintLine ( \" "else statement" \" ) } ReadLine ( ) }
